div.p: [Matthew] Previously on Love Island...

p.span: A new arrival sowed the seeds of doubt.

div.p: Oh, wow.

Things just got spicy
with Lauren coming into the villa.

[Matthew] America voted for Lauren
to date Connor.
I don't want you to go.
Oh, my God.
Why would America do this to me?
Why would they take my boyfriend?
[Matthew] And she chose two more boys.
Johnny and Carrington.
A lot of the dudes are about to be tested.

I got my popcorn ready
and I can't wait to see what happens.
[Matthew] Tonight...

I'm looking for somebody fun
and outgoing and honest.
Check, check, check.
[Matthew] Let the love games begin.
You were exactly what I was looking for.
Do you want to be with me still?
Things have swayed in your favor.
I definitely feel something for her.
[Kierstan] What is going on?
I'm shaking.
I do care about you.
[upbeat music]

[Matthew] New islander Lauren
is going on three dates.
I'm going to go with...

[Matthew] She chose Johnny
and Carrington for two of them.

p.span: But in what will undoubtedly be
with a quiet dignity and grace.

div.p: Why would America do this to me?
Why would they take my boyfriend?
[Connor] Oh, my goodness.

-[indistinct]
-This is beautiful.
Look at this.
[Lauren] Okay. We're on top of a roof.

-First time for--
-My first.

-Okay.
-Thank you.
You're welcome.

-Look at this. This is grand.
-[Lauren] I know.

-This is absolutely incredible.
-Cheers.

-Cheers.
-To getting out of the house.

To getting out of the house,
first time out of the villa.
Only took you one day, took me ten days.

But we're here right now
and that is all that matters. So cheers.
Obviously this was cast upon us.

-Sure.
-I'm really happy that it did happen,

I wanted to talk to you today,
at some point,

even to get to know you on some front,
I was like, "Who is this person?"
Can I give you my honest been of you
when I saw you this morning?

I'd love to hear it.
I will keep it between us.
Perfect.
You're a very beautiful girl.

-Thank you.
-You have this unique energy
that you brought just about you.

It seemed like you had
such an air of confidence,
you were exactly what I was looking for.
[Matthew] Whooo boy, back at the villa

p.span: Mackenzie is still in a state

div.p:
So where does your head go
with America voting?

It goes with they think
I'm not good enough for Connor.
And they think that he deserves better.
Why would they pick him?
Do you have any idea?
That is what I am saying.

I think that they think
that I don't deserve him.
I want to be transparent with you though.
I see an even match.

That being said, this is not
an opinion that I have,

is that other people have expressed
that maybe
you have been controlling of Connor.

Or maybe you have had extreme reactions
about the way that he has carried himself.
Do you feel like that is true at all?
I just don't see how I control him.

I think that is just, I think
most people don't know Connor

-very well.
-Hmm.

But how is it I'm controlling
when certain couples
spend all day together, all day?

I just like, I guess I just don't get
where that is coming from.
And I literally constantly voiced it.

And I even encouraged Connor,
"Go talk to the new girl,

go talk to her," he is like,
"I don't want to."

Tonight it is so hard,
I just want to be with him.
And I just wish that he was here.

And I know how upset he probably
is on that date right now
because he probably knows how upset I am.

And that is just the kind
of person Connor is.
He always thinks about my feelings.
I am interested in you.

I feel like I have been
kind of filtering myself
to accommodate someone else.

Why do you let yourself have that
restricted feeling?

To be honest with you,
there are certain things

of Mackenzie that
I know inherently are who she is.

And I realize that there are
incompatibilities with us.
And things I just can't change.
No matter how hard I try.
I just wanted to be like, "Are you okay?"
Yeah.
Do you need help? Blink twice.
No for sure.
You seem a little bit trapped.
I played a big part in that.
She doesn't give you the space to breathe.

I am not sure you realize
like living this can only last so long

until you either get
over it or you explode.

No, you are challenging me
to be honest with myself

and making me the be comfortable
to say it to you.

I am very much open to getting
to know you more.

-You sure?
-And getting to know you
on a more personal level.

-Absolutely.
-Then you have a battle to fight.
I know I do.

But I'm there. Give me like, a signal,
give me an eye code or something
it will be like, we'll go talk over here.

Yeah. I'll give you a double wink
or something.

Yes, because she scares me,
so I can't imagine how you feel.

But you have to stop living
for other people, baby.

[Matthew] While Connor finishes
his intervention-- sorry, date,

Do you want me to be
completely honest with you?
Sure, yeah.
I think that...

I think that Connor
is the nicest guy here.

And I don't think that
how you react sometimes
puts Connor in a good spot.

Because Connor would never
want to hurt you.
But when you react like when you walk off
in the situation that he can't control,
you kind of put him in a tough situation.

I ran away from the table
because I was so devastated.

Because for me, my whole life is
because I always felt
like I was never good enough.

I felt like I was never good
enough for friends.

I felt like I was never good
enough for a guy.

I was constantly cheated on
and broken up with.

And I am so aware
of how incredible Connor is.

The first couple of days,
it seemed like impossible
to believe that someone was this way.

I am like, "How is this person out
there for me
that is so perfect for me? How?"
Just please, please be nice to him.

I know you will be.
Just give him a hug and a kiss.
[Mackenzie] That is all I want to do.

Why are you acting
like I don't want to do that?
[girl] No, I hear it, I hear a little.
[Moira] Here he comes.
Hold on, no, act cool, act cool.
Hello, hello.
[Connor] Oh, oh. I missed you so much.
[Mackenzie] Don't leave again, please.
[Connor] Give me a kiss.

All right. Can you go to the balcony
and I talk to you in a bit?
Just sit and talk for a little bit.

I will tell you what was said,
how it went.
You look so pretty.
So yeah, so basically the conversation

kind of revolved around
just getting to kind of know her
and just how she felt,

and, what she said,
being completely honest.

She did not feel comfortable
enough to come up to me
because of where we were at.

And I completely understood
the point where she was coming from.

So I guess I'm curious on this date,
did you try to do anything

to reassure her that you were
equally wanting to be

in this relationship with me
and that I'm not controlling?
So...

the entire controlling
relationship part was--

was the top of the conversation
that we talked about.

And how I need to be able
to be honest with myself

-to be honest with someone else.
-Uh-huh.

And when I had a conversation
with you yesterday,
the multiple conversations we had,
that was the first day that I...

truly offloaded
a lot of my emotions inside.

It was just these little things
that have built up inside me.
[Mackenzie] Am I missing something?
Do you want to be with me still?
What's wrong?

I don't want-- at the end of
the day I don't want you...

to be concerned or have second
thoughts about where I am at.

-I just want to know how you're feeling.
-I know, I know.
So I think honestly right now,
you are the one that I want to be with.
And you know, not just for our time here
but also our time when we get out there.
Uh-huh.
[Connor] So that is what I have to say.

I truly want to be better
and I'm so sorry.
I think like the absolute world of you.

I think I started to really feel
for the first time

that I am falling for you
and like in a big way.
I mean me, look at me mushy gushy.
[Connor] Yeah. Who is this person?

[Mackenzie] We both expressed
to each other

that we're falling in love
with each other.
I mean, it is happening very fast.

It's funny because you have
all of the qualities

that I have ever wanted to find
in a girlfriend, in a relationship.

It's so hard for me
to believe Connor is one of mine.
I have never met someone who understood me
in the way that he does.
Can I ask you a question?
Uh-huh, yeah.

So, Mackenzie, would you like
to be my girlfriend?
Uhm, I'll think about it. Yes.

-Yes?
-Obviously.
I thought you would never say yes.

-Oh.
-So thank you.
[Matthew] Boy, he sure told her.

p.span: for starters, America served up Connor,
but for her second course, she selected
prime cut of beef cake Johnny.

div.p: How are you?
There you are.
Finally made it.

-Yeah.
-You look amazing.
So do you.
Happy to be here. This is beautiful.

-Isn't it gorgeous?
-Why did you pick me?
I liked something about you.

-You think I'm cute?
-I think you are cute.

You've got good chat, a little vibe,
I don't know, I think you're fun.
So, what are you looking for?

I'm looking for somebody fun
and outgoing and honest and real.
And truthful.
Check, check, check.

-Yeah? Check, check, check, you sure?
-Definitely.

I feel like I'm getting like
a little bit eyes from you

-across the villa.
-Yeah?

I mean, you are
an attractive girl, you know.

You come in here
with your leopard print on.
How do I not turn my head?

-So your head was turned.
-Most definitely.
What a night, you guys.

-Should I be worried?
-I know.
Why is this taking so long?
I'm laughing because I feel so relaxed.

It is not a chance in hell that Johnny
would pick her over you.
Thanks, Tre.
What is your situation?
I hear different things.

I'm definitely happy with
where I am at with Cely, you know.
We kind of hit it off.
We have a lot in common.

But, is that enough for you,
is that what you want?
Are you really happy?
Okay, are you right.
You know, we're not unrealistic

in the sense that we know that beautiful
people are going to come here
and I am going to be attracted to them.

Yes, but there are different things
on connecting on different levels.

-Yeah.
-That's important too.
Exactly, that is why, you know,

I need someone that's going to
not only be beautiful,

and bring a bubbly personality,
there has to be a connection

strong enough to turn my head
not only physically but emotionally.
That's right, yeah.
You kind of outdo 'em a little bit.

Cheers to our first date,
your first day in the villa.
Yeah.

-Cheers.
-And to getting to know each other.
Man, the date with Lauren was really good.
She looked beautiful.

But I am in here trying to find
a real connection

and that is
what I think I found with Cely.

-What's up, baby?
-Hi.
How did it go?

The fact that we have been
able to open up to a really deep level

made me very attracted to Cely
not only physically but mentally.
Lauren has a lot to live up to.
[Johnny] It was a really cool date

but you know, it is going to take
a lot for me to turn.
And you know, I told her.
You look beautiful tonight, of course.
But that is not enough.
I am still open to getting to know her,

but I am a firm believer
that what we have is just,
it's deep.

I respect him enough to allow
him the freedom to go
and explore something with someone else.
We're connecting on a deep level.

We're building towards something
so I'm confident in myself.

I'm like let me find out, that
someone else is going to scratch
your back the way that I do?
I'm irreplaceable.

I was like "Oh man, we've been
gone for a long time.
She is going to be over here stressing."

-I wasn't.
-You weren't?

See, look at that, that is
what I am so attracted to.
I was like laying on that couch.
I was like I kind of want a snack.

Kierstan was like,
"How can you eat right now?"
Like I don't know.

Thank you for not worrying
so much and having faith in me.
Uh-huh.

[Matthew] Like the John Wick movies,
Lauren is hoping part three

p.span: will be he best of all.

div.p:
-How are you?
-I'm good, how are you?
I'm good. Best for last, huh?
Best for last, exactly.
Kind of what I was thinking.

-Cheer to you.
-Yeah.
Cheers to you and to me and to the villa.
And having this amazing view.

I was going to tell you look
how beautiful it is.

You almost match the buildings,
you just have this like...
I don't match the buildings.

You have a bright outfit on,
just like this building.

-Just glitzy like that.
-Looks good.
Thank you.

-You look glitzy.
-Thank you.
Yeah.

What was it that made you want
to choose me for a date?
I felt like when we talked

that I got a little bit of
realness out of you that I liked.

-I wanted to see a bit more of.
-Yeah.

-Definitely.
-I felt that.

But I don't know because you
didn't really tell me

your opinions on me or what
you thought or how you were.

You just have, kind of like
how you feel towards me

there is kind of something
that I want to get to know.

-Like an unspoken something.
-Like an attraction.

Exactly. I don't know what it is,
but I got to figure it out.
You have to figure it out.
[Kierstan] Where is my guy?
I just want my guy here so he can tell me
how much he likes me.
Don't we all?

It's odd because I can't look at you
or talk to you.

I have to wait
for specific moments to talk.

You are in a very tough position.
I had it easy.

I guess with me I'm very genuine
and up front

and I am telling you,
I am happy with Kierstan, but...

-You could be happier?
-Totally so, and

I am not looking to just be
in a couple where I'm happy.

I want one that feels like,
almost like it's a home.

-I was going to say, "feels like home."
-Yeah.

So that is kind of what
I realized I want to find.
I think you're sweet.
I would like to think so as well.
Yeah, of course.
[both] Cheers.

-Thank you for coming.
-Thank you. This is incredible.
It is. It's beautiful.
Do you hear?

[Kierstan] There he is.
Are they holding hands?
They look really close together.

-Hi, guys.
-Hey, welcome back.
[Lauren] Thank you.
Was it everything you wanted and more?

[Carrington] My date with Lauren
went very well, I think.
I just can't lie to myself.
I definitely feel something for her.

I mean I want to be very
respectful to Kierstan
because I do like her a lot,

but I'm going to have to make
some tough choices.
[Kierstan] How was it?
It was fun, it was cool.

-Roof top?
-Roof top.

-Nice.
-It was pretty nice

but do not take it in a bad way
because it's not.
So...

Are you wanting to keep this open
and pursue her?
I don't know, I will be honest.
You went on two dates last week, right?

And you came back
and like one was shut down
and one was a little open.
I know how I feel.

And there is really no one here
that I want to get to know.
And this is literally-- Oh, my God.

No, Kierstan, I know, I just feel
like it would be unfair for me

-to not get to know this one girl.
-I know.
And I get that it sucks,

but I was so adamant
about letting you know.
I just didn't expect this.

Clearly my intuition sucks,
like what is going on?
I'm shaking.
I do care about you.
[indistinct]

I just wanted to say
I apologize if any of my actions
today made you uncomfortable or...
No, no, no.

A certain way, I think Connor
and I were misunderstanding
where we were at.
I think that we are now on the same page.
That was all before me coming in here.

Maybe I just was the catalyst
for spiraling something

-that was already happening.
-Yeah.

Moira, you are just brushing
your teeth with this dry toothbrush,
What is that going to do?
You're right. Justine.

She just came in and was like,
"Sorry if I came across like this..."

And I was like, "You don't have to
apologize to me." Mackenzie.

She is acting to me like
he was ready to end it,
you know what I mean.
But I guess he's not or whatever.

It's like you can give him
the space to explore that connection

but that doesn't mean you slap
a smile on your face
just so he's comfortable. You know?

I do understand where she is
coming from, but I don't feel bad

about what I did
because I'm keeping it real.
I don't know if she is the one.

And I did get locked up
in three days talking to her
and now it is the sixth day,

so it is crazy for me
to pull a Connor-Mackenzie
so I don't feel bad about it.
Tomorrow's a new day, people.

Yes, it has. I did not expect it
to end like this.
[soft music]

p.span: But the peace won't last long.
Thanks to the drama new girl Lauren caused
on the dating show everyone signed up for.

div.p: [Caleb] Morning, everybody.
How are you?
Honestly, a little better.
Hi, guys.
Good morning, how did you sleep?

-Pretty good.
-It's a new day, ladies.
I know.
[Kierstan] Let's do it.

[Matthew] Literally 12 hours ago
Connor and Mackenzie

p.span: But it's a new day, which means

div.p:
I feel like you have expressed
that you feel as though

there have been highs and lows,
and you're concerned
that like that is too much for you.
So I think that is why I was so surprised
when this became such a big deal.

[Connor] I do have a lot on my mind,
kind of right now,
as far as how I feel towards Mackenzie.

I have been struggling to be
honest with myself.
I just think that all of our conversations
have just been going in circles.

I don't have the balls
or the confidence to express

how I'm truly feeling towards her,
in the moment.

And I just cater to kind
of what she wants.
Do you feel that in anyway, shape or form
that you have been controlling or...
manipulative towards me?

I can totally understand
how my actions or reactions to things

have made you question
if I am trying to be controlling
or manipulative.
And I want to change those things.
I'm sorry.

I didn't know you thought
that way and I apologize.

Right now is one of those times
that I want to ask

for a little bit of time and space
to just-- process things,
okay? Can I have a hug?
I'm sorry.
Okay. Thank you.

[Matthew] After Carrington's date
with Lauren,

p.span: and bikini and scans the threatening

div.p:
Yeah, no, I just wanted to talk
to you because I know

-you wanted to talk to me too.
-Yeah.

I feel like yesterday so much
was going on.

Exactly, and why push it off until later
and let things be weird.

I think it is just good
to get it out of the way.

So obviously the thing in hand
is Carrington.

[Kierstan] Did anything happen
at y'all's date with Carrington?

-No?
-No, just talking.
Cool.

He is going through a little
something right now.
I know.

Where I think he is trying to
find out who he wants to be.
Exactly. I like that he is--

-And you have to let him do that.
-Of course.

You are just basically saying
that nothing is changing,
we are still together.

He says that he wants to be
with me and that he...

So he is saying that he wants
to be with you.
Yeah.
[Matthew] Carrington, the mic is yours.
I do like Kierstan.
I am into her.

Do I know if it is 100 percent?
No, I don't.

We've been kissing for six days,
so I said if you want to get to know me,
I am open to that. That is all it is.
It is very fair for me.

And she's done it
and I really don't think it's a big deal.
[chatter]
I'm going to like people.
And that's just the name of the game.

I shouldn't hold myself back
from feelings that I am having,

even though I'm with Kierstan,
she treats me greatly,

but I think it is time to test
our relationship and see

if she is the one for me
and I'm the one for her.
I'm all in with Carrington.
We're just going to see how this works.
I want open and honest communication
and I feel like I'm getting that.

But like if you want to pull him
for a chat, you will go for a chat,
and kind of let me be aware of it.
Yeah.
[Lauren] It's awkward.

I don't know what he said
to her, if you guys want to

continue to lie to each other
for another couple of days

or however long, then you know,
be my guest,

but like some of these people
have a hard time
at being honest with themselves.
For sure.

I just want to talk to you
and I'm really glad how it went.
Give me a hug.
[Lauren] I appreciate that. You're...

You know, it's hard to be
honest with yourself

because clearly some people
in this house can't do it.

[Matthew] After being unable
to communicate his feelings

Last night was pretty, it was
a pretty emotional night for me.

I had some real, real talk
conversations with Mackenzie.
And I honestly told her how I was feeling.

And I was like, "Do you think that
you have been manipulative
and controlling towards me?"

Like up until now. Because
that is how I have been feeling.

And I am trying to find all of these
reasons to justify her reactions

and I'm like, my energy,
my emotional even physical energy

has just been completely
and utterly drained.

-And it's been-- it's been exhausting.
-Yeah.

I've had a lot on my mind
over the past few days.

And then Lauren coming in definitely
pushed me to the brink

of truly realizing what I am looking for
here during my time here.

I came in here looking
for something that would be

complementary relationship
with each other.

I think that is what all of us
are trying to find.
Yeah.

And I think where I am at
right now I think I have reached

a point where I realize that
that is just not what we have.

And I do not think that her
and I are compatible.

I feel like I need to address
that with her.
Are you leaning towards doing that?

It sucks to say this but
an option for me at this point
is... breaking up with her.
[ding]
[Cely] I got a text!
Shut up.
Who got a text? I got a text.
Who got a text? I got a text!
Gather around the fire pit, islanders.
Is that Moira coming in hot.
We're all here, all accounted for.

"Girls, prepare to get wet
in today's challenge.

All washed up, hashtag wet hot

hashtag slip n slide."
I like the sound of that.

Wow, even limping is hot in slow mo.

I like to call, all washed up.

were smiling upon us today.

They gave us beautiful cars,
beautiful women,
working at the car wash.

Everything that we needed
to have a wonderful time.
Who's ready to play All washed up!
Kierstan, you are up first.

She has a bucket.

God!

Oh, so the girls perform a

She usually doesn't kiss like that.
We just kind of kiss like-- smooches.
Today she laid it on me.
So definitely making a statement.
Up next, Rachel.

And I think that it was really

for all of us girls to just get out there
and just have a great time.
And I know the guys had a great time too.
Oh, my gosh.
Yes, Rachel!
Get that kiss, girl.
Let's give it up for Mackenzie!
[cheering]
[music]
Oh!

Oh.

Whooo!
Oh.

Killed it.

Okay, okay.

maybe even a little bit embarrassed.

Me and Caleb are in a couple.

Let's see it, Cely, what you got?

And give my man

to kiss is Carrington.

-[girl] Get it, girl.
Get it girl.
[Kierstan] I'm not intimidated by her.
I mean I think I'm hotter than Lauren.
[cheering]

-Don't look.
-I have to.

So we have come together
and we made a group decision.

And unanimous decision
that the winner of this contest...
is Lauren.

And nobody is waiting for Moira.

p.span: a tough day going down water slides

div.p:
So awkward, and Rachel, I will pull you
so we can talk, obviously.

Hey.

Big night, big night, big night,
even bigger decisions, ladies.
Are you okay?

Bro, like she honestly
could have sent you home...
That's what I'm saying. She feels me.
And she gave you a chance.

-I was like hey.
-Here is the thing,

I might have to make a decision and I'm
trying to find the middle ground
to make the best decision for myself.

If you would have asked me
right after we got the text
who I was going to pick,

I would have been pretty confident
in my answer.
[Caleb] I 50/50.
[Tre] It's normal to go back and forth.

At the end of the day, you got to do
what makes you happy, bro.

[Caleb] Since the conversations
I have had today, so far,
I've become a little bit more unsure.

I already have opened up
myself to Justine.
So I can't really rule her out right now.

How did that change in
literally less than 24 hours?

-I slept on it.
-[indistinct]
Sleeping on things changes a lot.

[Tre] I feel good
about tonight's recoupling.

It's always good when are you not
the one at risk of being dumped

from the island,
and you kind of have that power.
Justine could go home,

somebody's feelings are going
to get hurt, it sucks.

You were able to go out
and see another option
versus you're set on Mackenzie,

if you weren't put in that
situation you were...
Yeah, I agree with that.

The past few days
with Mackenzie and I has been
a pretty emotional roller coaster for me.
And with Lauren coming into the villa,
it has made my decision a difficult one.

And I really don't know
where I am going to go.

The house has been shaken.
I'm here to to find love,
I'm here for the right reasons.
I just want to know what kind of--
what your thoughts are on tonight

and what you are hoping for
and what you want.
I mean obviously I'm hoping you pick me.

Sometimes you have to swap
around to find love.

I guess we will see if I made
the right choice tonight.

I like that you are here I think
it's opening my eyes
and a lot of peoples'.
I wish I had more time.
If I were to go, it's way too soon--

I don't think I have had
enough time in the villa,

enough time for people
to get to really know who I am,
what I am about.

I feel like there is going to be
some interesting things going on

tonight, especially
with the recoupling thing.
Yeah.

But I think more importantly
is about how you feel.

-In all of this.
-Yeah.
I just feel nervous.

I genuinely don't know
what is going to happen.
I feel like anything could happen.

[Matthew] I don't know
what's going to happen.

p.span: The boys don't know, nobody knows.

div.p: [soft music]
[Matthew] The recoupling is here.

p.span: The boys will choose the girl
they want to couple up with.
And the one girl left single
The first boy up is Calvin.

div.p:
I want to couple with this girl
because sunshine shines through her eyes
and illuminates the entire villa.

In the short amount of time
that we have been able

to know each other,
she has shown great strength.

Strength to make hard decisions,
strength to speak her mind,

and last but certainly not least,
strength to keep the party going
even when her knee has other plans.

So the girl I want to couple up
with is... Miss Moira.
My heart could explode.

I would like to couple with
this girl because with the time

I have got to spend with her,
I've been able to realize

my feelings getting stronger
and stronger with her.

She brings this positive energy
to the villa
that rubs off on all of us.

Her ability to be 100% herself
all the time
is unparalleled to anyone that I know.

She is unbelievably attractive
and every single day
I am more and more attracted to her.

So the girl I would like to
couple up with is...
Cely.

I want to couple up
with this girl because...

she has helped me discover my purpose
for being here.

And helped me realize
the opportunity that awaits us
here in the villa.

I look forward to discovering
the untapped potential
that still awaits us.

And I look forward to becoming
a better man because of it.

The girl I would like
to couple up with is...
Mackenzie.
So good.

I would like to couple up with this girl
because she's amazing.
She is so beautiful.
I honestly can't keep my eyes off her.

Although we haven't known each
other for that long of a time,

I do feel like there are very,
very deep feelings there.

And currently I know we both
like each other a lot

and I'm so excited to figure out
if we are meant to be together.

So the girl that I would like to
couple up with is...
Kierstan.
I would like to couple up with this girl

because not only is she
drop dead gorgeous,

she's unique, she's confident
and it is not a secret,

wherever she goes, her presence
is very much felt by everyone in the room.

I look forward to getting to
know her even more

because I feel like
the potential is skyrocketing.
And that itself excites me.

So the girl I would like
to couple up with is...
Lauren.

-I was nervous. I ain't going to lie.
-Were you?
[Tre] Yes, I was.
[sighs]
[soft music]

I would like to couple up
with this girl because
from the moment I walked into the villa,

she has radiated nothing
but joy and positivity.

And although we are just
in the beginning stages

of getting to know each other,
I wholeheartedly believe
that she is an incredible woman.

Our time together has been unlike
anybody else's here in the villa.
We also are here for the same thing,
trying to find a connection.

I think that she is going to
bring the absolute best out of me
and I hope that I can do the same for her.
So the girl I want to couple up with is...

[Matthew] Back at our recoupling,
Caleb must now choose the girl

I would like to couple up
with this girl because

our time together has been unlike
anybody else's here in the villa.

I think that she is going to
bring the absolute best out of me
and I hope that I can do the same for her.
So the girl I want to couple up with is...
Justine.
[soft music]
[ding]

"Rachel, you are now single
and that means you have been
dumped from the villa.

You have 30 minutes to pack
your things and say your good-byes,

hashtag cashing in your chips,
hashtag fun while it lasted."
[soft music]
[Rachel] It's okay.

-You guys want to help me pack up?
-No, 'cause you're not going.

[Kierstan]
With Rachel leaving, it's very hard.
We came in together.
We experienced everything together.
Oh, my God, this isn't real.

From meeting people
to sharing our feelings,
sharing a bed.
But even though this is a very sad thing,
I'm going to see her on the outside.

So it's not a goodbye,
it's a see you soon.

-It's okay.
-Hey...
Thank you, I appreciate that.
[Rachel] Bring it in.

[Carrington]
We're going to miss you, Rachel.

I hope you guys all find love.
You deserve it.
[all] Love you.
[soft music]

[Rachel] I am almost as shocked
as everyone on the island.
I am really at a loss for words.
[Caleb] Man.
That's so crazy.

[Rachel] I feel like there is
no other way to cut it
other than like he lied to me.
So honestly, I don't regret anything.
I love everyone in there so much.
So I am sad to be leaving Love Island,
but I am so glad for the experience.

It's finally good to see some
good happen to Justine in here.
It's been hard.

I just think that you have been a blessing
to everybody here.

For awhile I thought the Love Island gods
had betrayed me,
they hated me, but look at them.
[indistinct]
I got my man finally in here.
Caleb is that guy.
I just can't, I am so happy.
[Matthew] Next time...

[Mackenzie]
She never had an interest in him.
I heard differently.
You're a very beautiful girl.
I am not interested in her.
That is news to me.
